title: The Kingdom Fantasy Pack
description: This is a music pack featuring twenty six fantasy-based instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral effects, all of the pieces within this asset pack are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present The Kingdom Fantasy Music Pack! This is an asset pack that contains twenty six orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of fantasy. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.


Asset Listing Below:

A King Is Born - B Minor - 134 BPM

A Kingdom Of Peace - E Minor - 130 BPM

Altar - D Major - 136 BPM

Betrothed - G Minor - 90 BPM

Camelot - G Major - 119 BPM

Civilization - F Major - 120 BPM

Council Of Seven Kings - Ab Major - 120 BPM

Dark Forest - C Minor - 115 BPM

Elegy - B Minor - 132 BPM

Field Of Fire - A Major - 81 BPM

Finish The Fight - Eb Major - 90 BPM

Fire And Blood - E Minor - 120 BPM

Ice And Fire - F Minor - 91 BPM

Inverness - C Minor - 71 BPM

Keeper Of Peace - G Minor - 130 BPM

Knight In Shining Armor - G Major - 130 BPM

Missing Heroes - Eb Major - 97 BPM

Prologue - B Major - 71 BPM

Prophecy Of Kings - C Minor - 71 BPM

Redgrass Field - G Major - 70 BPM

Skies Of Valhalla -A Minor 70 BPM

The Age Of Antquity - D Minor - 77 BPM

The Queen's Throne - Ab Minor 130 BPM

The Quiet Fields - D Minor - 75 BPM

The Rain Falls - E Minor - 130BPM

The Sword Of Hope - A Minor -120 BPM
